mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_question( user_sid, question_type_sid, title, content, created_date, modified_date ) VALUES ( #{userSid}, #{questionTypeSid}, #{title}, #{content}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: SELECT TQ.*, QT.type_name FROM tb_question as TQ LEFT OUTER JOIN tb_question_type as QT ON TQ.question_type_sid = QT.question_type_sid WHERE user_sid = #{userSid} ORDER BY question_sid DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_question SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, modified_date = now() WHERE question_sid = #{questionSid}
